text:
Example: Paired comparisons test
Joe Andrews is examining changes in estimated betas for the common stock of companies
in the telecommunications industry before and after deregulation. Andrews believes that
the betas may decline because of deregulation since companies are no longer subject to the
uncertainties of rate regulation or that they may increase because there is more uncertainty
regarding competition in the industry. The sample information he gathered is reported in
the following figure. Determine whether there is a change in betas.
Beta Differences After Deregulation
